Key Match Events: Twins' miscues on bases and in the field cost them in a 4th straight loss
Manuel Margot was thrown out at home on a hard-hit single to right field
A two-run double off Manuel Margot's glove in left field turned a deficit into a tie, then into a decisive deficit
Caleb Thielbar allowed a go-ahead double to Matt Olson
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins have talked about the need to execute and get back to playing clean, aggressive baseball
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Rocco Baldelli expressed frustration with the team's recent performance
Baldelli trusts third-base coach Tommy Watkins' decisions
Margot took responsibility for his mistakes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The loss pushed the Twins' deficit in the AL Central to 3 1/2 games behind the first-place Guardians
The Twins have a three-game lead over the Red Sox for the final AL Wild Card berth
